thread.title: More ferries cancelled due to bad weather
thread.title_full: More ferries cancelled due to bad weather | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: More ferries cancelled due to bad weather
text:
Condor Ferries have been forced to cancel a number ferries due to bad weather.
Eight services have been cancelled today; an additional service will be operating tomorrow to accommodate passengers.
This evening's St Malo to Jersey and Jersey to St Malo service has been cancelled.
The 14:00 service from Poole to the Channel Islands and back has also been cancelled.
This morning the Poole service had to cancel trips to Jersey from Guernsey and back, heading straight to Poole.
A full list of cancellations and rescheduled services are available here.
Last updated Mon 14 Sep 2015 Travel Guernsey Jersey
